short.ar: انضم إلى ورلد قيسر، وتحدى أصدقائك، واستمتع بمتعة ألعاب التخمين!
short.am,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,en_U: Join WorldGuessr, challenge your friends, and enjoy the fun of guessing games!
short.de: Tritt WorldGuessr bei, fordere deine Freunde heraus und genieße das Vergnügen an Ratespielen!
short.es: Únete a WorldGuessr, desafía a tus amigos y disfruta de la diversión de los juegos de adivinanzas!
short.fr: Rejoignez WorldGuessr, défiez vos amis et profitez du plaisir des jeux de devinettes!
short.it: Unisciti a WorldGuessr, sfida i tuoi amici e divertiti con i giochi di indovinelli!
short.ja: WorldGuessrに参加して、友達に挑戦し、推測ゲームの楽しさを味わいましょう！
short.ko: WorldGuessr에 참여하고 친구들에게 도전하며 추측 게임의 재미를 즐기세요!
short.pt_BR: Junte-se ao WorldGuessr, desafie seus amigos e aproveite a diversão dos jogos de adivinhação!
short.ru: Присоединяйтесь к WorldGuessr, бросайте вызов своим друзьям и наслаждайтесь увлекательными играми на угадывание!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
# WorldGuessr Chrome Extension Installation Guide

## Why Install WorldGuessr?

WorldGuessr transforms your browsing experience into an engaging geography adventure. This free Chrome extension brings the excitement of global exploration right to your browser, letting you discover and learn about locations worldwide during your regular browsing sessions.

## Installation Benefits

- Instant access to geographical challenges without visiting external websites
- Seamless integration with your Chrome browser for quick gaming sessions
- Zero impact on browser performance
- Regular updates with new locations and features
- Enhanced learning opportunities during browsing breaks

## Installation Instructions

1. **Access the Chrome Web Store**
   - Open Google Chrome
   - Navigate to the Chrome Web Store
   - Search for "WorldGuessr" in the search bar

2. **Verify and Install**
   - Look for the official WorldGuessr extension
   - Check the developer name and reviews
   - Click the "Add to Chrome" button
   - Confirm the installation when prompted

3. **Post-Installation Setup**
   - Click the WorldGuessr icon in your browser toolbar
   - Grant necessary permissions if requested
   - Start playing immediately with the free version

## Security and Privacy

The extension requires minimal permissions to function:
- Access to Google Maps services
- Basic location services (optional)
- No personal data collection
- No intrusive advertisements

## Using the Extension

After installation, you can:
- Click the extension icon to start a new game
- Challenge yourself with daily locations
- Track your progress and scores
- Compete with other players globally
- Access educational geography content

## Support and Updates

- Regular updates ensure optimal performance
- Built-in help section for quick assistance
- Active community forum for tips and discussions
- Direct developer support for technical issues

Install WorldGuessr today to transform idle browsing time into engaging geographical exploration and learning opportunities. Perfect for students, travelers, and anyone interested in discovering the world from their browser.
